title: Environment update in Ibadan: Clean Energy and Clean‑Up Campaigns
body:
2025-12-26 — In Ibadan, educators highlighted clean energy as schools adopt new methods to improve student outcomes.

Experts say plastic recycling is accelerating, with communities reporting practical benefits in everyday life.

Stakeholders emphasized inclusive access, noting that reliable infrastructure remains key for sustained progress.

Local officials in Ibadan announced support for clean‑up campaigns, aiming to reach more families across the region.

Parents expressed optimism, while calling for continuous training and affordable devices.

The program will roll out in phases, with pilot initiatives scheduled over the next quarter.

Students and teachers welcomed the changes, citing improved engagement and better exam preparation.
